verses.verse: לְ֭כוּ <WH1980> come נְרַנְּנָ֣ה <WH7442> let us sing לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD נָ֝רִ֗יעָה <WH7321> let us make a joyful noise לְצ֣וּר <WH6697> to the rock יִשְׁעֵֽנוּ׃ <WH3468> of our salvation

נְקַדְּמָ֣ה <WH6923> Let us come פָנָ֣יו <WH6440> before his presence בְּתוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> with thanksgiving בִּ֝זְמִר֗וֹת <WH2158> unto him with psalms נָרִ֥יעַֽ <WH7321> and make a joyful noise לֽוֹ׃

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אֵ֣ל <WH410> God גָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> [is] a great יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> For the LORD וּמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> King גָּ֝ד֗וֹל <WH1419> and a great עַל־ <WH5921> above כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> above all gods
אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whose בְּ֭יָדוֹ <WH3027> In his hand מֶחְקְרֵי־ <WH4278> [are] the deep places אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְתוֹעֲפ֖וֹת <WH8443> the strength הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> of the hills לֽוֹ׃

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֣וֹ הַ֭יָּם <WH3220> The sea וְה֣וּא <WH1931> who עָשָׂ֑הוּ <WH6213> [is] his and he made וְ֝יַבֶּ֗שֶׁת <WH3006> the dry יָדָ֥יו <WH3027> it and his hands יָצָֽרוּ׃ <WH3335> formed

בֹּ֭אוּ <WH935> O come נִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֣ה <WH7812> let us worship וְנִכְרָ֑עָה <WH3766> and bow down נִ֝בְרְכָ֗ה <WH1288> let us kneel לִֽפְנֵי־ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD עֹשֵֽׂנוּ׃ <WH6213> our maker

כִּ֘י <WH3588> for ה֤וּא <WH1931> He אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> For he [is] our God וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ <WH587> we עַ֣ם <WH5971> and we [are] the people מַ֭רְעִיתוֹ <WH4830> of his pasture וְצֹ֣אן <WH6629> and the sheep יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> of his hand הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <WH3117> To day אִֽם־ <WH518> if בְּקֹל֥וֹ <WH6963> his voice תִשְׁמָֽעוּ׃ <WH8085> if ye will hear

אַל־ <WH408> not תַּקְשׁ֣וּ <WH7185> Harden לְ֭בַבְכֶם <WH3824> not your heart כִּמְרִיבָ֑ה <WH4808> as in the provocation כְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> [and] as [in] the day מַ֝סָּ֗ה <WH4531> of temptation בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> in the wilderness
אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> When נִ֭סּוּנִי <WH5254> tempted אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> When your fathers בְּ֝חָנ֗וּנִי <WH974> me proved גַּם־ <WH1571> though רָא֥וּ <WH7200> me and saw פָעֳלִֽי׃ <WH6467> my work

אַרְבָּ֘עִ֤ים <WH705> Forty שָׁנָ֨ה ׀ <WH8141> years אָ֘ק֤וּט <WH6962> long was I grieved בְּד֗וֹר <WH1755> with [this] generation וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> and said עַ֤ם <WH5971> It [is] a people תֹּעֵ֣י <WH8582> that do err לֵבָ֣ב <WH3824> in their heart הֵ֑ם <WH1992> like וְ֝הֵ֗ם <WH1992> like לֹא־ <WH3808> not יָדְע֥וּ <WH3045> and they have not known דְרָכָֽי׃ <WH1870> my ways

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Therefore נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <WH7650> Unto whom I sware בְאַפִּ֑י <WH639> in my wrath אִם־ <WH518> Truly יְ֝בֹא֗וּן <WH935> that they should not enter אֶל־ <WH413> into מְנוּחָתִֽי׃ <WH4496> into my rest
